item.title: Android蓝牙通信——AndroidBluetoothManager
item.description:

To get a Git project into your build: Step 1. Add the JitPack repository to your build file Add it in your root build.gradle at the end of repositories: allprojects { repositories { ... maven { url 'https://jitpack.io' } } } Step 2. Add the dependency dependencies { compile 'com.github.kongqw:AndroidBluetoothManager:1.0.0' } AndroidBluetoothManager 效果图 PNG GIF 基础功能 添加权限 <uses-permission android:name="android.permission.BLUETOOTH" /> <uses-permission android:name="android.
